message: I'll give you a small share, but you can try to do better in the next round.
Take it or leave it, I'm not going easy on you!
You're not going easy on me, so I won't go easy on you either!
You're not going easy on me? I'm still in this to win!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to make it easy for you!
You're enjoying this, aren't you? Well, I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
You're not going to get it all, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting close to the end, but I'm not going to let you have it all!
Last chance, Alice. Don't think you can outlast me!
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any softer!
This is it, Alice. Last chance. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
